properties.entry: SELECT A.SALES_DATE , A.SALES , A.REFUND , A.TOTAL_SALES FROM DAILY_SALES A WHERE TO_CHAR(SALES_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd') BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY SALES_DATE
SELECT SUM(A.SALES) , SUM(A.REFUND) , SUM(A.TOTAL_SALES) FROM DAILY_SALES A WHERE TO_CHAR(SALES_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd') BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT A.SALES_DATE , A.SALES , A.REFUND , A.TOTAL_SALES FROM DAILY_SALES A WHERE TO_CHAR(SALES_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd') = ?

INSERT INTO DAILY_SALES ( SELECT TO_CHAR(A.ORDER_DATE,'yy/MM/dd') , SUM((C.UNIT_PRICE + D.SIZE_PRICE) * B.QUAN) , 0 , SUM((C.UNIT_PRICE + D.SIZE_PRICE) * B.QUAN) FROM POS_ORDER A JOIN MENU_ORDER B ON (A.ORDER_CODE = B.ORDER_CODE) JOIN MENU C ON (B.MENU_CODE = C.MENU_CODE) JOIN MENU_SIZE D ON (B.SIZE_CODE = D.SIZE_CODE) WHERE TO_CHAR(A.ORDER_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd') = ? GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.ORDER_DATE,'yy/MM/dd') )

UPDATE DAILY_SALES UI SET UI.SALES = UI.SALES + (SELECT SUM((C.UNIT_PRICE + D.SIZE_PRICE) * B.QUAN) FROM POS_ORDER A JOIN MENU_ORDER B ON (A.ORDER_CODE = B.ORDER_CODE) JOIN MENU C ON (B.MENU_CODE = C.MENU_CODE) JOIN MENU_SIZE D ON (B.SIZE_CODE = D.SIZE_CODE) WHERE A.ORDER_CODE = ?) , UI.TOTAL_SALES = UI.TOTAL_SALES + (SELECT SUM((C.UNIT_PRICE + D.SIZE_PRICE) * B.QUAN) FROM POS_ORDER A JOIN MENU_ORDER B ON (A.ORDER_CODE = B.ORDER_CODE) JOIN MENU C ON (B.MENU_CODE = C.MENU_CODE) JOIN MENU_SIZE D ON (B.SIZE_CODE = D.SIZE_CODE) WHERE A.ORDER_CODE = ?) WHERE TO_CHAR(UI.SALES_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd') = ?

UPDATE DAILY_SALES UI SET UI.SALES = UI.SALES - (SELECT SUM((C.UNIT_PRICE + D.SIZE_PRICE) * B.QUAN) FROM POS_ORDER A JOIN MENU_ORDER B ON (A.ORDER_CODE = B.ORDER_CODE) JOIN MENU C ON (B.MENU_CODE = C.MENU_CODE) JOIN MENU_SIZE D ON (B.SIZE_CODE = D.SIZE_CODE) WHERE A.ORDER_CODE = ?) , UI.TOTAL_SALES = UI.TOTAL_SALES - (SELECT SUM((C.UNIT_PRICE + D.SIZE_PRICE) * B.QUAN) FROM POS_ORDER A JOIN MENU_ORDER B ON (A.ORDER_CODE = B.ORDER_CODE) JOIN MENU C ON (B.MENU_CODE = C.MENU_CODE) JOIN MENU_SIZE D ON (B.SIZE_CODE = D.SIZE_CODE) WHERE A.ORDER_CODE = ?) WHERE TO_CHAR(UI.SALES_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd') = ?
